title: Sportscast - September 30, 2015
text:
Sports » Sports Featured » Sportscast - September 30, 2015 Sports Featured 
Updated: Wed, Sep 30 2015, 10:45 PM 
The full sportscast from the Fox 28 News at 9 on Wednesday, September 30th. Related Stories   Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Nominate your favorite coach from any sport in the form below. Your Name: Tell us about your nomination: Please re-enter the code shown in the image below. AP News Wires Get This 
COUPLE ASKS STRANGERS TO CRASH WEDDING 
FORT MYERS, Fla. (AP) -- Can you really call it crashing a wedding if you're invited to crash it? Business News 
Survey: US businesses added jobs in September at solid pace 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- Buoyed by strong consumer spending and steady home sales, U.S. businesses added jobs at a healthy pace in September, according to a private survey. Science/Tech News 
IN THE NEWS: TODAYTIX TO EXPAND 
NEW YORK (AP) -- Like a successful Broadway show, an app for theater tickets is getting to hit the road nationally.
